resource.name: CDA All Data
resource.description: The principal amounts, sale dates, interest rates, terms, purposes, ratings, costs of issuance, financing team participants, issuance documents, and annual reporting (if applicable), among 67 other data points required under California Government Code section 8855, of the various types of debt issued by all state and local government agencies in California.

resource.name: Marks Roos Yearly Fiscal
resource.description: This dataset is based on reports on the financial status of Marks-Roos Local Bond Pooling Act public financing authorities and local obligors who sold debt in California. The information in the publication is cumulative and reflects debt sold after January 1, 1996. It provides information on the fiscal status of debt issued after 1996 and on defaults and draws on reserves reported to CDIAC during the reporting period (fiscal year) covered by each report.
resource.attribution: California Debt and Investment Advisory Commission
columns_description: Indicates type of Authority bond issue OR whether Local Obligor issued bonds purchased, received loaned proceeds or was a member agency lessee
AUTHORITY. Total amount of interest earnings from any investment contract(s)
AUTHORITY. Total costs of issuance of authority bond issue. (Generally, this amount will appear only on the first YFSR filed for the financing.)
Name of issuing agency as defined in CCR Title 4, Division 9.6, Chapter 1, Article 1, Section 6000
Required minimum balance (if any) of bond reserve fund
Indicates whether issue is an Authority Issue of Local Obligation
Date of the debt "Sale" as defined in CCR Title 4, Division 9.6, Chapter 1, Article 1, Section 6000
LOCAL OBLIGOR. Total amount of taxes due as of most recent tax roll
LOCAL OBLIGOR. Total amount of taxes unpaid as of most recent tax roll
Total amount in bond reserve fund as of 6/30
Total par amount of bond issue or total amount of loan or lease as reported on the Report of Final Sale, in US dollars
Additional issue information, as reported by filer on Report of Final Sale
Indicates whether bond or other debt has been Refunded, Repaid, or has Matured as of the most recent YFSR filing
Date of debt retirement, as reported by filer
Amount of unpaid bond principal or loan balance
Amount of bond bond reserve fund held in cash
Reserve fund amount secured by a surety bond
LOCAL OBLIGOR. Amount of administrative fee charged to the local obligor by the issuing Authority
AUTHORITY. Maturity date of any contract (e.g. a GIC) whereby bond proceeds were invested

LOCAL OBLIGOR. Delinquency rate for taxes and assessments supporting the local obligations, reported as the percentage of the total applicable tax increment, special tax, or benefit assessment installment due for the year
County of local obligation bond issuer, loan recipient, or member agency lessee.  "Multiple" indicates activity in more than one county
Balance in capitalized interest fund (if any)
LOCAL OBLIGOR. Indicates whether delinquent taxes were reported on county assessor's report for issuing agency
Unique ID number assigned by CDIAC to each report of issuance filed
AUTHORITY. Total amount of any commissions or fees paid pursuant to any investment contract
